content.description: For more than a year, Demyana has experienced consistently high levels of distress. She has experienced distress in her school life, work life, and relationships with her peers.
content.question: Which of the following statements is most likely true of Demyana?

choices.label: She has experienced immune suppression due to the prolonged high level of distress.
She has been using emotion-focused coping to successfully relieve her distress.
She has experienced fewer symptoms of anxiety and depression.
She has experienced instinctive drift through these many challenges.

content.answer: She has experienced immune suppression due to the prolonged high level of distress.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
